title: botter everywhere

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body:
Okay so i have been leveling a lower account, while i have been just spamming coop vs AI i have noticed that there is constantly people running some botting programs. these people act just like the bots and they feed like theres no tomorrow. this is a screenshot of a game i just had with 3 botters and a sivir that must be new as. this is getting super old super fast. i make sure i report these people for cheating every time but i never get notified if anything got done. 
ARE THESE PEOPLE GETTING PERMA BANNED????
this is a joke riot, go into any coop ai game and your guarantied 1-3 botters EVERY game.

please confirm these scumbag shit lords are being perma banned. okay thanks. otherwise ill start spamming boards of every game i have a botter in.

replies.body:
https://postimg.org/image/ix09txkkj/
game straight after, another 3 afk botters

yeah that's unfortunate, you'll definitely be facing bots in coop vs ai and if you aren't playing a hard carry champ or are a league god, when the enemy team gets very fed from the feeder bots it can be very hard to win and just imagine how much worse of an experience this is for new players who don't have the advantage of runes, masteries and experience with champions, csing, laning and matchups.

Also no riot is not going to address the issue of feeder bots since even though it's cancer, the fresh lvl30 accounts are a key source of new accounts where money is spent to buy a new set of skins and riot would rather just leave it be and try to focus on other things in their game, since few people actually care all that much about botting since it only affects a small portion of the community, those that are new and those that are trying to create smurfs.

Also having to carry 4 feeder bots kinda makes an intermediate co-op vs ai, equivalent in difficulty to a high bronze-low silver ranked match despite riots bots (whilst stronger now) still not really being as strong as a human player. These 4 feederbot carry matches are actually a very good practice mode for training in snowballing and mechanical focused gameplay. Snowball and hard carry the game faster than the 4 bots can feed and lose it and the riot bots group up and the feeder bots are useless as even cannon fodder.

I like to consider coop vs ai as it's own gamemode with the nickname: 'One Man Army'.
 Carry hard and fast, or lose it all.
I find it challenging as normally, 5 human could be too one sided.
